"Chaotic Roar of the Dragon":
"We have detected hostile readings in the
Sanctum of planet Amduscia, including
Darkers and enemies from other planets.
This abnormal phenomenon seems to have
driven local Dragonkin into a frenzy.
We have confirmed that a high-ranking
dragon is instigating the frenzy. Suppress it.
―――――――――――――――――――
Clear by collecting 1,674 Quest Points.
Quest Points are shared with the room."

"We've detected an unusual
phenomenon where enemies
not native to Amduscia are
appearing within the Sanctum!"

"The Dragonkin have also become
wild and aggressive, possibly due
to the influence of the Darkers
that appeared at the same time."

"If you can eliminate the powerful
reading causing the phenomenon,
things should go back to normal!
Please do whatever you can!"
